nasa_technology1839292199579603438.content: Researchers are working on an idea that may vastly improve how we build in space. Launching large objects to orbit today is limited by rocket size/cargo capacity. The Bend-Forming process may beat these limitations and transform in-space construction. dir="ltr" href="https://t.co/9USpd8kmfk" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" target="_blank" role="link" style="color: rgb(29, 155, 240);">go.nasa.gov/3EayCc6
